question: YOUCH!  Charlie horses are making me miserable!  PN from type 2 diabetes...nerve damage in feet and hands mainly.  After TWENTY years all of a sudden I have charlie horses SO BAD in my calves I SCREAM!  I had some in my TOES...my toes in my feet were spread all apart and the big toe stuck STRAIGHT UP.It was bizzare!  HELP!Age 47 female, cymbalta, lyrica, metformin, hdyrochloriazide, lisonipril, pain meds, all no help for muscle spasms.Is this NORMAL with neuropathy?
title: Help!  BIZARRE Muscle Spasms Common w Neuropathy?
